<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_n08owuslPa1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=The%2BKerbapult&channel=xacktar&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=3602846"></object></p>

<p><a href="http://www.twitch.tv/xacktar/profile"><strong>Xacktar</strong></a> made a catapult. It flings Kerbals. There’s really not much more to say than that. Sure there’s a lot more to <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/xacktar/profile"><strong>Xacktar</strong></a>, like his wonderful video guides, but this video speaks for itself. It’s fun and as far as we can tell, no Kerbals were truly harmed during the making of it.</p>

That's me!

:D :D :D

I about had a heart attack when I saw my name pop up there!

You guys rock!

EDIT: Oh, and there is at least four confirmed 'injured' by Kerbapult activities. The latest of which was Fredler, who was the unfortunate victim of too much power.
Look at the right of the screen in the middle of the video. Mouse attack!

Look at the right of the screen in the middle of the video. Mouse attack!

Yeah, that happened because the game screen was just a smidge over the side of my monitor, I didn't notice till halfway through the video, lol.

Ok, not meaning to spam the thread....

...but if anyone else wants to fire the Kerbapult, you can find it here.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kerbapult/

Edited January 31, 2014 by Xacktar

Nice work emperor Xacktar!

Also, I think this thing is worth trying with multiple kerbals at once...
I saw this liked by Danny!

Nice work emperor Xacktar!

Also, I think this thing is worth trying with multiple kerbals at once...

In the same basket... BRILLIANT!

I did end up coupling 3 Kerbapults together for a simultaneous launch... about killed my computer with the lag, lol.
I bet if they had rockets in the medieval age they would used it to power catapults. Use technology Mad Max style.
